summary: Both previously reported issues have been addressed correctly and no new blocking problems were introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: SSE size limits used string length instead of byte length, allowing multibyte overflow
previous_issues_status.notes: Replaced with Buffer.byteLength for both eventData and buffer, enforcing byte-accurate limits.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Stream reader not canceled on early termination, risking resource leaks
previous_issues_status.notes: Added reader.cancel() in finally with safe error handling before releaseLock.
